txt.en: 'Midsummer is a joyous festival honouring the bonds of friendship, family, and marriage. All across Middle-earth, the Free Peoples celebrate through dance, song, artisanry, and rites of old!\n\n'If you wish to join in the festivities here in the Shire, you need only join us here at the Party Tree. However, I hear there are some Tweens about nearby with a mind to disrupt my carefully-planned merriment!'
Where can I join in Midsummer festivities?
